materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the city of Kandy in Sri Lanka. The photograph overlooks the city, with a water body on the left and hill-tops in the background. There are roofed buildings amongst trees in the center of the photograph, with an open field on the left. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Kandy, Ceylon
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Kandy (Sri Lanka) Cities
